description.description: An optional text that describes other significant information about the simulation scenario

duration.description: Duration of the simulation, given in seconds

hydraulicTimeStep.description: Determines how often the hydraulic state of the network is calculated. Given in seconds

flowUnits.description: Units in which flow rates are expressed in the simulation

startSimulationTime.description: Time of day at which the simulation begins

endSimulationTime.description: Time of day at which the simulation ends

flowConvergenceAccuracy.description: Criterion to determine whether the target flow has been established (difference between the real and target flow

modelParameters.description: Description of the set of modifications to be applied to the water system for the simulation

targetValues.description: Description of the set of target values defined by the user before the simulation

waterAttribute.description: A sub-property (e.g., flow). A water attribute issued from the above data models. It follows fully this data model and it could be a property or a relationship. It contains the target values for specified properties, defined before the simulation

inputParameters.description: Description of the set of modifications to be applied to the water system for the simulation
